attributes.action: All murderers should face the death penalty if found guilty.
attributes.additional_details: I believe it is now time for action and not words.Good law abiding,innocent men ,women and children (relating to pedaphiles)are losing their lives to the scurge of humanity and the bereaved families have to spend the rest of their lives tormented by the events.To murder some one, you obviusly have no morals, descent emotions or intent.What good are they to the human race and society...Zero. You loose a loved one to a murderer,if they are found guilty-imprisoned-YOU THE PUBLIC TAXPAYER IS KEEPING THAT SAME CRIMINAL in food,clothing,shelter and a tax free life. I rest my case.
